A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Went in as a casual fan wanting to love this movie. I overall enjoyed episode 7 and was looking forward to further development in The Last Jedi. \n\nThis is my first movie review ever\, I saw TLJ last night and i woke up still angry about this movie. Bad\, out of place humor\, complete disregard of the themes and suspense that the previous movies set up\, and just straight up corny scenes (starting with leia in space) destroyed this movie for me. I'm absolutely astonished at the rave reviews it has been getting by critics. Why?!?!
